body:
<!--- Remove sections that do not apply -->

This issue tracker is only for technical issues related to bitcoin-core.

General bitcoin questions and/or support requests and are best directed to the [Bitcoin StackExchange](https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com).

For reporting security issues, please read instructions at [https://bitcoincore.org/en/contact/](https://bitcoincore.org/en/contact/).

### Describe the issue
My bitcoin core wallet synchronized to December 31, 2013 was stuck, then synchronization can no longer update, how to solve?
### Can you reliably reproduce the issue?
#### If so, please list the steps to reproduce below:
1. I installed the computer installed Bitcoin Core version v0.14.0 (64-bit), the block is not synchronized to complete the case, I received a bit of coins, but the wallet has not shown, and the block has been confirmed on the network ,How to do it?
2. Can Bitcoin Core receive and pay Bitcoin if the blocks are not synchronized?
3. Has been shown in the synchronization, has been several days, or stay in sync 2013, how to solve?

### Expected behaviour
Tell us what should happen
Can I uninstall re-install? If the re-install, I originally in this wallet to receive the bitcoin will disappear?
### Actual behaviour
Tell us what happens instead
Will bitcoin core wallet have any way to improve the speed of synchronization?
### Screenshots.
If the issue is related to the GUI, screenshots can be added to this issue via drag & drop.
Has been shown in the synchronization, has been several days, or stay in sync 2013
### What version of bitcoin-core are you using?
List the version number/commit ID, and if it is an official binary, self compiled or a distribution package such as PPA.
 Bitcoin Core version v0.14.0 (64-bit)
### Machine specs:
- OS: Windows 10
- CPU: Intel Core i5-2410M 2.30 GHz
- RAM: 4.00 GB
- Disk size: 750 GB
- Disk Type (HD/SDD):  HDD

### Any extra information that might be useful in the debugging process.
This is normally the contents of a `debug.log` or `config.log` file. Raw text or a link to a pastebin type site are preferred.
![20170506003453](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/28524124/25805865/d7625fb6-3433-11e7-84da-5fe31a691452.png)
title: My bitcoin core wallet sync block data to December 31, 2013 can no longer be synchronized, so far has been shown in the calculation process...
